EmailTemplate.subject: See you at the 2019 C-130 TCG
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
2019 C-130 TCG World Wide Review
Please join us...
Honeywell is proud to provide systems that enable the continuing success of the C-130 aircraft. It’s been more than 60 years since the first flight of the first “Hercules” prototype, and since that milestone, Honeywell has helped global C-130 fleet operators maintain operational readiness in even the harshest of environments and combat theaters. From advanced avionics to industry-leading satellite communications systems, Honeywell's reliable and efficient solutions add value for global operators.
Visit us at booth #420 to learn more about Honeywell’s standard and aftermarket solutions.
DATE October 21st - 22nd 2019
TIME 7:00am - 5:00pm
LOCATION Cribe Royale Hotel and Convention Center
Honeywell Aerospace Event Team
